title: Adaptation of the TIMBRE methodology for brownfields gully erosion analysis in urban areas.
content:
Publication date: Available online 12 June 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Caiubi Emanuel Souza Kuhn, Fábio Augusto Gomes Vieira Reis, Flávia Regina Pereira Santos de Siqueira, Christiane Zarfl, Peter Grathwohl, Victor Cabral
